name: Commandos: Beyond the Call of Duty
notes:
- Recent GOG installer required (v2.1 or above).
- The game may leave fullscreen when movies play.
- The mouse may not be captured well initially, just move it around until the cursor appears and avoid clicking until then.

files.game: N/A:Select the Commandos expansion's installer provided by GOG

content:
exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Commandos BCD/coman_mp.exe
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Commandos expansion's installer provided by GOG
game:
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui /suppressmsgboxes
    description: Installing Commandos
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
